item.title: Addresses
item.description: How to create and manage addresses. CREATE Create an Address. console.log("API PARAMS: ..\/..\/..\/api-params\/addresses\/create.js", apiParams) GET POST PUT PATCH DELETE Send Params Headers Auth Path Params Query Params + + Request Response Status: ✎ ✕ document .
